document_data.caption: A map showing Alu in southwest Halruaa.
document_data.name: Alu
document_data.mainbody: '''Alu''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Alu was located on the coast of southwest Halruaa. The town lay along the shore of the western half of the [[Bay of Taertal]] on the [[Great Sea]].
